snippet: On a day where people all over the world are absorbing the horror of a Taliban attack on a Pakistani teenage girl who speaks out for the need for girls' education, we report on a more hopeful piece of news: the growing involvement of women as...
abstract: On a day where people all over the world are absorbing the horror of a Taliban attack on a Pakistani teenage girl who speaks out for the need for girls' education, we report on a more hopeful piece of news: the growing involvement of women as entrepreneurs in several African countries.

headline.main: Steps of Progress for Women in Africa
